name: rm-6-key
effect: Unlocks room 6 on the abandoned ship.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A key that opens a door inside the ABANDONED SHIP.

flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A key that opens the door to Room 6 inside the ABANDONED SHIP. It is old and looks easily broken.
